title: [GAMEPLAY] Camille E Bug
body:
Hi I'm a Challenger Camille player in NA, Weeknd.

There is currently a bug with Camille's E's target selection.
If Camille tries to jump on a target with her E, and if there is another enemy champion near her route to her initial target, her E will fizzle out and she will float in space even if she doesn't collide with the  champion that you were not targetting.
Here are the links for such examples.
https://clips.twitch.tv/SourPolishedHeronTF2John   
https://clips.twitch.tv/PiliableTangibleOryxOSkomodo
This bug has lost me quite a bit of kills and makes Camille's kit less fluid.

replies.body: This bug just happened to me, it still exists
